messages.subject: Re: Bookmarks to Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/31/99 1:18:26 PM PST, tn-k4of5@if.rmci.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/31/99 1:18:26 PM PST, tn-k4of5@... writes:

<<
I am STILL waiting to hear from SOMEONE, ANYONE, on the subjects mentioned
in my origninal introductory message. Where is everyone?


------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ho >>

Nancy,

I just read your letter this morning. I have been preparing an answer for
you <g> -- I am not totally familiar with all the laws of all the different
states, so if someone from your state doesn't answer right away, it may take
a little while for an answer to appear. We are a brand new site, up only a
little over a week!! So glad you found us, and keep on checking back, the
answers will come as more and more people find out about the site!!

Mary

messages.subject: Re: Bookmarks to Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/31/99 4:18:36 PM Central Daylight Time, tn-k4of5@if.rmci.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/31/99 4:18:36 PM Central Daylight Time,
tn-k4of5@... writes:

<< I have already hit the web site, that is where I found out about
Unschooling in the first place. I was impressed and excited, and read just
about everything there was to read at the site. Including: What is
Unschooling, my state laws on the subject and frequently asked questions,
and all the essays.>>

Wow!! You'll be happy to know that we will be continually adding peices to
the site. The front page should change on a weekly basis, as should the book
reviews. We have some more ideas on the back burner, but we wanted to go
ahead and release the site..... it seemed as if we could *tweak* things for
forever. :)

<

I'm just getting home. :) Again! In the last 10 years I have not travelled
as much as I have in the last 30 days. It's been fun and exciting, but I do
declare I haven't slept more than 3 hours a night all month.

I've about 500 peices of email, and when I sort through it, I will return to
start talking. I do love to talk. <vbg>

LisaKK
LisaBugg@...

messages.subject: Bookmarks to Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: I ve built some bookmarks to the Unschooling.com site at the ONElist bookmarks area. To access this handy reference list just go to the ONElist site
messages.messageBody:
I've built some bookmarks to the Unschooling.com site at the ONElist
bookmarks area. To access this handy reference list just go to the ONElist
site http://www.oonelist.com and click on Member Center, then click on the
Unschooling-dotcom list, then click on Bookmarks. There are links to the
main page, the message boards, the newsletter information, "What is
Unschooling?," the library, and resources.

The bookmarks area is open to any listmember - add your own favorite
unschooling links, your family page, or whatever you think others will be
interested in checking out!

Helen
Helen@...
http://unschooling.com
<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>
"I took the road less travelled by,
and that has made all the difference."
-Robert Frost
<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>

messages.subject: Re: Bookmarks to Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: I have already hit the web site, that is where I found out about Unschooling in the first place.  I was impressed and excited, and read just about everything
messages.messageBody:
I have already hit the web site, that is where I found out about
Unschooling in the first place. I was impressed and excited, and read just
about everything there was to read at the site. Including: What is
Unschooling, my state laws on the subject and frequently asked questions,
and all the essays.

I am STILL waiting to hear from SOMEONE, ANYONE, on the subjects mentioned
in my origninal introductory message. Where is everyone?
